strings.pages.species-missed.note.text: The script displays all the species missed by the user, compared to another user or project.{1}In the case of comparison with a project, it shows the species included in the project and not encountered by the given user.{1}There may be discrepancies if the user did not encounter any of the subspecies of the species he encountered.
strings.pages.species.note.text: The script picks all species from the project uploaded to the site before the selected date (Creation Date), picks all species uploaded after the selected date, then compares the lists and leaves only the new ones. Unfortunately, the iNaturalist API does not allow you to select species added to the project relative to the date, so if "Research status" is set in the project requirements, there is a chance that an observation added before the specified date has been added to the project after that date, but it will not be in the list. Similarly with those observations that were redefined after the specified date.
strings.* Список неполон, должно быть {1} пользо: * The list is incomplete, there must be {1} users!
strings.API iNaturalist из-за каких-то ошибок в: The iNaturalist API may in some cases return an incomplete list of subscribers due to some errors. This is not a problem of this script, but of the data it receives
strings.Id или имя проекта для сравнения: Id or project name for comparison
strings.В поле места требуется вводить только ци: You are only required to enter a numeric id in the place field.
strings.В поле проекта можно ввести либо цифрово: In the project field, you can enter either a numeric or string id (you can copy it from the address bar of your browser).
strings.В поле таксона можно вводить как цифрово: In the taxon field, you can enter either a numeric id or a name (Latin or Russian).
strings.Виды, встреченные только этим пользовате: Species encountered only by this user
strings.Данный список примерен, и может не учиты: This list is approximate, and may not take into account some of the observations, especially if the project requires an "Research Grade".
strings.Дата загрузки наблюдений (по которую счи: Date of observation loading (on which to count new species)
strings.Дата загрузки наблюдений (с которой счит: Date of downloading observations (since when to count new species)
strings.Если введён не ID, скрипт, после потери: If you didn't enter an ID, the script will try to find the taxon in the iNaturalist database and replace it with the most suitable (in the iNaturalist's opinion) one.
strings.Если ошибка повторяется, вы можете напис: If the error repeats, you can write to the author ({1} or {2}) and attach the following information:
strings.Иначе дата рассматривается как дата набл: Otherwise, the date is treated as the observation date
strings.Конвертер для табличных данных с йната,: Converter for tabular data from iNaturalist, as well as an editor for posts.
strings.Поиск не удался, проверьте корректность: Search failed, check if the name you entered is correct
strings.Показывать виды, впервые зарегистрирован: Show species reported for the first time in this period
strings.Получение списка всех участников проекта: Getting a list of all project members.
strings.Произошла ошибка при получении или обраб: An error occurred while receiving or processing the data. Please try again later.
strings.Просмотр списка видов проекта, а так же: Viewing the list of species in the project, as well as the list of species encountered only by the specified observer.
strings.Просмотр списка видов, не встреченных по: View a list of species not encountered by the user compared to another user or project.
strings.Просмотр списка новых видов, появившихся: View the list of new species that appeared in the project during the selected time period
strings.Скрипт отображает все виды, отмеченные в: The script displays all the species marked in the project. It is also possible to display species that were observed only by the specified user.
